message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's close this deal.
